entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is the mother of Lily and sister of Harry. She is described as being able to understand the tone of a word, despite not knowing its meaning.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is Petunia's daughter and Harry's sister. She obeys her mother's command to leave.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is watching Lily and Petunia as they leave. He is described as having bitter disappointment.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the narrator of the scene and recognizes Snape's disappointment.

relationships.description: Snape watches Harry as he observes Snape's disappointment.
Petunia's actions cause Snape to feel disappointed.
Lily glares at Snape as she leaves.
